website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS15 is a well-appointed snapshot camera for the money with the mixed performance and photo quality typical of its class.
pros: Very good design, features for its price

customer_reviews.title: My first digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera basing on positive feedback from several buyers. It's my first digital camera and I bought it to photograph special moments of my life and, although I am not an expert photographer, I have to say that this is an excellent camera. Very easy to use for beginners, takes very good pictures, the battery is durable, among other attributes. Now I have 6 months of use and I have no complaints. I would like the zoom can be used in video mode too, is everything. Panasonic Lumix digital camera is my first and this brand will be my first choice to replace my small camera in the future. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this camera a while ago and I loved it until I lost it. It is a great point and shoot camera. I like the intelligent mode, meaning less thinking for me. It took great pictures. The zoom was a little lack luster. It wasn't the best, it wasn't the worst, it wasn't the most expensive, and it wasn't the least expensive, but it had amazing value for the money. I loved the camera so much that I bought another Lumix after I lost this camera.
customer_reviews.author: missam

customer_reviews.title: Good camera old faithful.
customer_reviews.text: Serving faithfully for quite few years as my 2nd camera where I can't carry my heavy DSLR. The Leica lense is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ranabir Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: After days and weeks of research and comparing cameras I decided on this one since it had all the features I was looking for and the price was just right. I've had the camera for about a month and in that time have taken several hundred pictures and so far it has been easy and straight forward taking pictures as well as getting them off the camera and on to my computer. I love the battery charger, it and the camera can fit together in my old camera case, just another bonus. While it has a few bells and whistles I have yet to explore overall this camera is the best one I've purchased in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-FS15
customer_reviews.text: This is the first digital camera I have ever had. I had considered buying a more expensive more versatile camera but this one was strongly recommended to me by a photographer cousin of mine who said that it would suit my rather simple needs just fine. He was absolutely right. It is simple to use, it has an easy-to-use zoom, and takes very nice clear pictures. It's light and fits easily in my pocket. I'm sure that people who want to play a bigger role in their photography would find it inadequate but someone wanting a fine inexpensive basically point-and-shoot camera can't go wrong with this one. Buy a soft case to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and handy camera, the battery last a long time, video is high quality. It has all you may expect from a pocket camera, picture quality is good and it is ready to use, fast auto focus. Zoom is not that neat but this is a ready to go camera for fast and spontaneous operations, nothing fancy
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: best camera ever in this range..panasonic Lumix..sharp clear colorful photos
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I ever had. More settings for better photos. Photos are absolutely clear and fantastic! Be sure to put the color setting on 'rich'..I can't remember the actual word right now but it makes a world of difference in the photos!
customer_reviews.author: barb d

customer_reviews.title: Good price - cool enough camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Lumix to my mother 2 years ago and it has been a very good camera since then. Now I wanted a camera for my own, and I bought this one after some market research. It does what I need; my only regret is that it takes its time to take the picture. I think Sony has faster shooting comparing with a friend camera last weekend trip. In spite of it, battery lifetime and performance is very good. The new night scenery takes a lot less time (1s shoot). It has more resolution/size options than before. A new power saving mode. Cool enough for a non-professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Barahona Garita

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for a friend, because I have the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FX150 and like it. My camera cost over $100 more than this one, but it came out sooner. Both take great pictures, but mine is a bit better. Still, for the price, this is one fantastic little camera, and my friend was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jonez

customer_reviews.title: Taking pictures
customer_reviews.text: Used the camera on vacation in Red River. Is simple to use and this was important for my wife. She wanted a camera that she only had to point and click. Do wish that the time delay with the flash was less. My old Cannon that this one replaced was slow too. Thought that improvement in this area would be made by now. Even so, I am pleased with the camera. Have only used it a short while so I can not say how the other features work. I would recommend this camera for its ease of use, the leica lens used and the other features offered. Will report again after using it more.
customer_reviews.author: Olddman

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in photo quality
customer_reviews.text: All of my photos have a blue tint to them. The white balance is way off. I set it manually, but the problem persists. The camera doesn't focus correctly indoors. I feel this is camera was a waste of my money, I don't feel I can rely on it to capture important moments. The battery life is also poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic's cameras are always quality guaranteed. On the other hand, it has a lower price that Canon or other brand that has similar features with a much higher price. I'm not a pro in photography, I just use the camera for fun or recreational use, thus, this camera is definitely for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tsui

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera. Worked great and beautiful color. The pictures were as good as a standard 33mm camera. Small, convenient and great price. Sorry to say it was run over by a truck. The camera I bought to replace it was a different brand and even though it is 15mp, it does not do half as well as the Lumix did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Menchetti

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older Panasonic. Loved that camera love this one. Looked at other cameras but decided on the Panasonic again I am not dissapointed. Thanks to Amazon I got the best price around and free shipping which was really fast.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great and simple Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a one-shoot camera for mother's day, and was the perfect gift excellent performance, great pictures and good size. I recommend this product if you are looking for a easy to use and good quality pictures camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando TANNUS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for everyday use. The picture quality is great. The camera is very easy to use and the features are pretty cool. For someone who is seeking just the point and shoot camera this ones is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mundra

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife who teaches at pre-school and takes lots of indoor individual and group photos. She wanted something small enough to carry in purse and basically point and shoot. So far camera has fit the bill and her photos look great. I have experimented with Macro and that does very well too. Only concern is that battery/memory card door and latch seem very flimsy and is easy to open accidently.
customer_reviews.author: TaosDude

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with this picture!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little camera! Battery lasts forever, it takes amazing pictures in almost all light settings, fastest economy-priced point-and-shoot I've ever seen, and it's soooooo cute! Really great! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: amphibiac

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my 9 and 10 year old sons. It is easily worked by them, and has withstood a fall to the floor already. Before I purchased this camera, I called my local camera store to get suggested cameras in this price range, and they suggested this model due to it's low incidence of repair needs.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Gargan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I originally lost this camera a few years ago and since replaced with other digital. I loved how this camera took pictures and how simple it was to take great photos. I am glad i did a little research before purchasing a brand new one. The camera came, with minor scratched but quality still great! plus the seller was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Lumix improves over prior models
customer_reviews.text: Able to buy in silver which was unavailable in local outlets. This is an improved model over prior Lumix cameras. shutter lag is much quicker. picture quality is vey good with a wider angle lens for better party shots. also good for real estate photos. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Richter

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: The panasonic lumix is the best camera I ever had! The camera has great features: Easy to use, nice zoom 5x, attachments to plug into the TV - great to see which to delete and which to save. two thumbs up - only thing I don't care for is the video function.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Priest

customer_reviews.title: Whatta sweet camea!
customer_reviews.text: Diamond in "the rough" of digital cornucopia small cameras. Whatta sweet camera!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in tiny packages
customer_reviews.text: With a surprising amount of functionality in a remarkably tiny package (think of a deck of cards) this camera outperforms many a snap-and-shoot with a very nimble shutter speed and a breathtaking view screen. The pictures rendered are very crisp and clear and the camera supports a wide angled format (usually only seen in DSLRs). To make the most of all the features, be sure to acquire one of the camera compatible memory cards; the video capability will not operate without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it broke pretty easily and i just never really liked it
customer_reviews.text: ah, it broke pretty easily and i just never really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: miso

customer_reviews.title: good camra
customer_reviews.text: very good camera I buy this because the lens I have canon 5mp. panasonic is 12mp. and bigger screen, more avantage of tech. it's small enough to put in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but it broke from 1 drop
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not bad. It is user friendly, easy to navigate. The picture quality was not as good as my older Canon. The biggest problem was that the camera was totaled after only one drop. It slipped from the carrying case and broke. Panasonic wants $110 to fix it and that's the price I got it for...I know it's my fault that it borke, but my old (and bulky) Canon got on the ground many times and it still works! And the pict quality was better despite the 5 mps on it! So if you want a good point and shoot camera look for Canon. Hopefully the new models are as sturdy as the older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Boris G. Tsenov

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Panasonic Lumix (The first one was stolen). My wife bought a Canon to replace our stolen Panasonic, but I liked our old one so much I took back the Canon (with her permission)and bought this one. It is small, light, big display, a variety of settings for those who like to tinker, a few modes for those who just want to take pictures without messing with settings, a decent zoom, and beautiful pictures. I've only had it for a little while, but the battery life has been great; we'll see how long it lasts. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants great pictures with the option to tinker for a very decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Perennial Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: Software and suppoert are horrible
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are fine but the integration with my Mac is terrible. I hangs up during transfer and the only thing I can do to restart is remove the camera battery., Despite several sttempts to contact Panasonic I can never reach anyone with any insight. I'm ready to throw this thing out the window. Would never buy another Panasonic camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Zebulon

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my son who is in the army stationed in Afghanistan. He is a gunner on a helicopter wanted to have something that he could use while in the air and moving. He loves it and says that the image stabilized zoom works great. He likes the manual focus option and is very pleased with the overall use and function.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I found the camera easy to use and the intelligent auto feature the best. I never have to think about my pictures again. Every once in a while I have to fiddle with it to turn on/off the auto flash, which should be made easier (forcing flash on while in intellimode), but otherwise nice quality shots with next to no thinking. A little slow sometimes to take the picture, but not too noticeable. Love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B. Diep

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera that was simple to use and small enough that I could carry it in my medium sized purse. This camera is perfect for me. I do not take a lot of pictures, but I still like what I do take to come out great and these do. I hope everyone else is as pleased with this camera as I am. I would buy it again. Beverly
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 16 year old daughter. Great quality pix, handy size. She's very happy. We are buying another one for my other daughter.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my second digital camera replacing my 5 year old Cannon A10. This is a fine camera. The portability and durability is unmatched. I have had no issues with the battery life or picture quality. I even used the video feature and was quite surprised with the quality. Of course it is not a replacement for my camcorder. Buy this camera. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cameras out there of this type and size. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mopar Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-level compact digital camera
customer_reviews.text: After I lost my Canon compact digital camera (4 yrs old) while taking pictures at the beach one day, I decided to replace it with a more compact and automated camera. I also did not want to spend more that $200.00. After much research I decided upon the Panasonic Lumis DMC-FS15. It was easy to learn to operate and I can carry it in my pocket. The LCD has several features that enhance its use. the pictures are very good if you operated the camera properly. I highly recommend it to anyone interested in a good mid level digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kplus8

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-FS15 by Panaxonic
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with plenty of features. We're very happy with the pictures, the range of options when taking pictures, and the super battery life. Hopefully, it will outshine our Canon 850IS that needed to have the telephoto lens repaired in less than a year, and after the repair, stoped autofocusing. For the money, I would pick the DMC-FS15 again. The lens is super!
customer_reviews.author: cameraman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use camera with plenty of features. Video is not HD but still pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Selected this camera due to a review on CNET.com and compared the features to similar priced cameras from Canon and Nikon. I am very happy with the Panasonic Lumix camera. It is very easy to use, has a lot of features, and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: So, I researched digital cameras for almost a year before buying this camera. It's perfect for me! This is my first digital camera, and I'm happy with all aspects of this camera thus far. I'm currently traveling in Panama, and it's size and picture quality are proving just fine. If you use a camera like I do, solely on vacations, you'll be just fine. I had read various reviews about the shutter speed being slow and lack of manual controls, but do not let those persuade you away from this camera. Maybe I'm naive to these minor details, since this is my first digital camera, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: OM Sweeper

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom as a Christmas present,showed her how to use it.Awsome camera and shipped really quick.I've also had a Panasonic Lumix myself for 4 years now and it made it through 14 months in Iraq and also survived an IED blast to our vehicle.I love my Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera a lot and people often comment on how professional my photos look. It's easy to use and small enough to fit in a pocket or purse easily.
customer_reviews.author: g.g.

customer_reviews.title: I love this obsolete Lumix
customer_reviews.text: When I dropped my 2 year old FS15 for the second time I was heartbroken that it was indeed broken. Panasonic doesn't make them anymore. This fantastic little camera has a Leica lens, 12.1 megapixels, 5x optical zoom, image stabilization and I carried it everywhere I went. After a long search, I found a refurbished (by Panasonic) one on Amazon. I received it promptly with all of the accessories and it works beautifully. Why do companies stop making wonderful things? I guess because Amazon can find them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: sha na na

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a little useful friend. You can carry it on your pocket, ready to shoot at your convenience. It takes impressive pictures and the battery last for almost a full day of constant usage.
customer_reviews.author: Lucabox

customer_reviews.title: Really nice camera, wish the menus were more user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Camera take great snapshots, and the 5X zoom is a nice touch, but give yourself some time to get around the menus in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: S. KUKER

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic DMC-F515
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for someone that is in need of a point and shoot type camera.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Richard

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera takes great pictures the only thing i dislike is the switch button to change the camera mode to review pictures mode, it looks it can be damaged with the time, a push button can work better
customer_reviews.author: Sid Mizard

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with this camera. Sent it in to be repaired. Panasonic sent me back the same camera with the same issues. Have to send it in again. Would not refund the money.
customer_reviews.author: dillo

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time SLR user (digital and 35mm) but wanted a pocket size-camera primarily for portability and ease of use. This camera is great. Tiny, easy to use, and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Lumix FS15
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product for the beginner, yet has advanced settings for more serious photographers. The wide angle and macro lens is fantastic.Would recommend a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera all around
customer_reviews.text: 1. Very easy to use on automatic mode 2. Excellent pictures 3. No complain at all
customer_reviews.author: TAT

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS15
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding lightweight digital camera. Just about the perfect small point and shoot digital camera. Easy to use, high resolution, lots of features, and with a tiny foot print. Easy to slip into a pocket or purse. The Lica lens is pretty nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. West

customer_reviews.title: panasonic lumix dmc-fs15
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera a few days ago after researching cameras for a while and decided on this one. The camera works great, it is very user friendly, and takes great pictures (both indoors and outdoors, if you want better get an slr). Bottom line: this camera does exactly what a point and shoot camera should do at a great price, you cant beat it. Im very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley F. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Good general camera, zoom could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera to carry around, not to big or expensive that you worry about it on vacations. Takes good pictures, my wife complains that the zoom could be better. I did manage to take pictures of everybody a few too many times on Thanksgiving, hope they invite me back for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: David Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera to always have something available for the everyday photo ops and it has not let me down. Very easy to use and understand. Havent found anything I dont like yet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: lumix purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had been waiting for this new Lumix Camera to be released, and the day it became available (April 1, 2009), I ordered it from Amazon. Amazingly, it arrived the next day. The camera itself has proved wonderful, easily used and easily learned. The camera is great; the Amazon delivery and service wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment in processing my order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one camera. On the same day, I received the confirmation of having ordered 4 cameras. I immediately called and asked for the error to be fixed. I was told just to refuse it when it came and another accurate order would be processed right away. Well, I'm being charged for 4 which I did not order and the single camera I did order NEVER CAME. The customer service here is about as bad as it can get. I deserve a call back which I will probably NEVER RECEIVE. I had hoped for a long experience with these people of buying merchandise. I'll look elsewhere. FOUR of the same type cameras? REALLY! Mad and Disappointed in Bowie, MD
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Beach

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS15 12MP Digital Camera with 5x MEGA Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueFROM THE MANUFACTURER


The 12.1-megapixel Lumix DMC-FS15 features a 29mm wide-angle Leica DC Vario-Elmar lens with a 5x optical zoom. Panasonic has enhanced the Intelligent Auto Mode (iA) on the DMC-FS15 from the previous FS models to now include AF tracking and Intelligent Exposure functions in addition to Mega O.I.S., Intelligent ISO Control, Intelligent Scene Selector and Face Detection. AF Tracking enables the user to "lock" the focus onto a moving subject. The camera then automatically tracks the subject as it moves, keeping it in focus without the need to hold the shutter button halfway down. Additionally, Intelligent Exposure helps capture natural-looking images by suppressing blocked shadows and blown highlights. It continually monitors the light source in the shooting environment and automatically activates the backlight compensation function if it detects the light source is behind the subject. 

Other features of the FS15 include a Venus Engine IV processor, which enables an advanced processing system and quick response times. An intelligent LCD screen detects light conditions and automatically adjusts the brightness levels for viewing in sunlight and helps to preserve battery life. The new Photo Frame mode lets the user put attractive borders around photos, so when printed, they look like postcards in picture frames. Also, the new My Scene setting lets the user assign their most frequently used Scene modes to the setting, and with a simple switch, access that scene instantly. The FS-Series is also capable of recording WVGA (848 x 480) motion pictures at 30 frames per second in 16:9 wide-screen format, as well as standard VGA (640 x 480) format.
feature_bullets: 12.1-megapixel resolution captures enough detail for poster-size prints
5x MEGA optical image-stabilized zoom; 29mm wide-angle Leica DC Vario-Elmar lens
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
